sections.heading: Chronic condition optimization
sections.summary: Chronic conditions like asthma, COPD, and heart failure often worsen during respiratory season. Proactive management—including timely assessment, individualized action plans and appropriate education for people living with these conditions— can help reduce complications, improve outcomes and support stability during high-risk periods.
